welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Gonzalez, the charming city known for its rich history and friendly locals. Get ready to discover all that our city has to offer and make unforgettable memories. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pensacola International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is primarily used for domestic flights operated by American Airlines and Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is primarily used for domestic flights operated by Southwest Airlines and United Airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network after accepting the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pensacola NAS Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Pensacola NAS Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
